function.name: check_availability
function.description: Checks calendar availability between the organizer and an attendee to find the next available meeting slot. Returns the next available 30-minute time slot within the next 3 days during working hours (9 AM - 5 PM).

attendeeEmail.description: The email address of the attendee to check availability with. This should be a valid email address.

startDate.description: Optional. The starting date to check availability from in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2025-11-24T00:00:00Z'). If not provided, defaults to today.
